## What to Do ##
Encode XML data. The platform will often take care of this for you, but make sure that it gets done.
## Why ##
Encode data that is included in XML documents for the appropriate context to prevent XML injection vulnerabilities.
## How ##
To encode XML data:
1. **Identify XML data used by the application.** Examine the application design to identify all XML data and XML data types used by the application. 2. **Identify code that handles XML data.** Review application to find code that uses XML data. 3. **Add data validation methods.** Add methods that validate all the data types stored in XML data and used by the application. 4. **Use validation methods.** Call the data validation methods from the previous step whenever loading XML data. Validation should be performed before encoding. 5. **Encode XML data.** Use the platform's XML encoding functions to encode data used in XML documents. Some XML parsers will encode data fed to them automatically.
